price: Enti hunu sε Nokorε, awurade foforͻ biara nni hͻ gyesε Nyankopͻn. Enti srε no bͻnefakyε wͻ wo mfomsoͻ ho, na (srε no bͻnefakyε nso ma) agyidiefoͻ mmarima ne agyidiefoͻ mmaa no. Onyankopͻn Nim mo nanteε mu ne moatenaseε mu (nyinaa).
arabic: فَٱعۡلَمۡ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لِذَنۢبِكَ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُمۡ وَمَثۡوَىٰكُمۡ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-iʿ'lam annahu lā ilāha illā al-lahu wa-is'taghfir lidhanbika walil'mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti wal-lahu yaʿlamu mutaqallabakum wamathwākum
